name: Revenge Of The Marshmallows
description:
Revenge of The Marshmallows

Compete against your friend(s) in a battle of pure hilarious skill. As a marshmallow your job is to collect a weapon and be the first to kill the other player.

This game is still in development, currently working on character customization, other levels to compete on, and a more dynamic camera.

Outlook into the future, ideally this will be the multiplayer segment of game play, but there will also be a two player coop story mode about saving Marshmallow kind from the the savage rule of the graham cracker king.

All art, programming, sound design, and level design is done be me. Gun shots are royalty free from soundbible.com
